00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              2ND ORDER BUTTERWORTH LOWPASS FILTER
00004  *              Butterworth filters have maximum flat frequency responce in the pass band.
00005  *
00006  *              Based on an algorithm from Dodge & Jerse (1997): Computer Music -
00007  *              Synthesis, Composition, and Performance. 2nd edition. Schirmer.
00008  *
00009  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00010  *              copyright © 2007 by Trond Lossius
00011  *
00012  *******************************************************
00013  */
00014 
00015 // Check against redundant including
00016 #ifndef TT_LOWPASS_BUTTERWORTH_H
00017 #define TT_LOWPASS_BUTTERWORTH_H
00018 
00019 // Include appropriate headers
00020 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00021 
00022 static const double kSquareRoot2 = sqrt(2);
00023 
00024 
00025 /********************************************************
00026         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00027 
00028         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00029  ********************************************************/
00030 
00031 class tt_lowpass_butterworth:public tt_audio_base{
00032 
00033         private:
00034                 tt_attribute_value              frequency;                                              // filter cutoff frequency
00035                 double                                  c, a0, a1, a2, b1, b2;                  // filter coefficients
00036                 double                                  xm1, xm2, ym1, ym2;                             // previous input and output samples
00037                 double                                  f, fb;
00038         
00039         
00040         public:
00041                 enum selectors{                                                                                                                 
00042                         k_frequency                                                                                     // Attribute Selectors
00043                 };
00044                 
00045 
00046                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00047                 tt_lowpass_butterworth()                                                                // Constructor          
00048                 {
00049                         set_attr(k_frequency, 4000.0);  
00050                         clear();
00051                 }
00052 
00053                 ~tt_lowpass_butterworth()                                                               // Destructor
00054                 {
00055                         ;
00056                 }
00057 
00058 
00059                 // ATTRIBUTES
00060                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00061                 {
00062                         switch (sel){                   
00063                                 case k_frequency:
00064                                         frequency = val;
00065                                         // calculations
00066                                         c = 1 / ( tan( PI*(frequency/sr) ) );
00067                                         a0 = 1 / (1 + kSquareRoot2*c + c*c);
00068                                         a1 = 2*a0;
00069                                         a2 = a0;
00070                                         b1 = 2*a0*( 1 - c*c );
00071                                         b2 = a0 * (1 - kSquareRoot2*c + c*c);                                   
00072                                         break;
00073                         }
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00077                 {
00078                         switch (sel){
00079                                 case k_frequency:
00080                                         return frequency;
00081                                 default:
00082                                         return 0.0;
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085                 
00086                 
00087                 // DSP LOOP
00088                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *input, tt_audio_signal *output)
00089                 {
00090                         tt_sample_value tempx;
00091                         tt_sample_value tempy;
00092 
00093                         temp_vs = input->vectorsize;
00094                         
00095                         while(temp_vs--){
00096                                 tempx = *input->vector++;
00097                                 tempy = anti_denormal(a0*tempx + a1*xm1 + a2*xm2 - b1*ym1 - b2*ym2);
00098                                 xm2 = xm1;
00099                                 xm1 = tempx;
00100                                 ym2 = ym1;
00101                                 ym1 = tempy;
00102                                 *output->vector++ = tempy;
00103                         }
00104                         input->reset(); output->reset();
00105                 }
00106 
00107 
00108                 // clear
00109                 void clear()
00110                 {               
00111                         xm1 = 0;
00112                         xm2 = 0;
00113                         ym1 = 0;
00114                         ym2 = 0;
00115                 }
00116                 
00117 };
00118 
00119 
00120 #endif  // TT_LOWPASS_BUTTERWORTH_H
00121
